title: Manipal vs Pes
content: guys give me an honest response,Manipal vs PES ? whats your thoughts ??

comments.body: Placements are same. The differentiator is fee and clg life choose between them lol..
Manipal, only if you are referring to main campus. Else PES. Search this subreddit - this is asked every year.

manipal - if u have money  
pes - if u have less money required for manipal

I left the manipal seat and came here, felt pes culture and the crowd is more serious, also placements here are slightly better.
Manipal is apparently not as chill as it used to be, go check out their sub, they are getting crazy random rules like pes does sometimes. 
In the long run manipal or pes prolly won't be too different.
